name: Retro Robot Boxes
description:
* Sold separately in their own handmade packaging * Contact seller for shipping quote 

All of them can move their arms and are mainly made out of big inox tea balls that serve as a box and vintage vacuum valves from the late 50s and early 60s
Full details here http://1unik.blogspot.com.es/2013/05/retro-robot-boxes-next-generation.html

From left to right:
GARY GOLDFINGER (20cm high)
RUBY ROBBIE (17cm high)
GLOWY GERRY (21cm high) *Some parts glow in the dark!
SQUINTY SCOTT (20,5 cm high)
BLUE BENNY (22 cm high)

name: Wasp Table Lamp
description:
The Wasp table lamp is a stricking piece during the day that gives a warm glow when it is switched on and casts impressive shadows due to the gaps on its lid.

Made out of a mustard yellow milk glass shade from the early 70s (turned upside-down), a metallic base from an old lamp, a metallic lid topped with a brass lamp part and a gorgeous, old huge Art DÃ©co bakelite drawer knob.
I have sprayed the metallic parts in matte black to get a nice contrast with the shiny glass shade, the switch and plug are black as well and the cotton cord has the same mustard colour as the glass.

Measures: 26cm diameter at its widest point, 30cm high.

* Contact seller for shipping quote *

name: Metropolis Table Lamp
description:
Metropolis is a sleek table lamp, all made in steel and chromed metal parts taken from an 80s wall sconce, vintage light fixtures from the early 70s and part of a vegetable steamer. The light bulb with a retro look and twisted filament adds up to the sci-fi combo.

Full details here: http://1unik.blogspot.com.es/2012/09/metropolis-table-lamp.html

Measures: 17cm diameter on its widest part, 25cm high

* Contact seller for shipping quote *

name: Maple Wood Boxes
description:
* Sold separately * Contact seller for shipping quote

Boxes made out of two hand carved maple wood bowls joined together with brass clasps and hinges. Both the outside part of the lid and bottom inner side are painted in self mixed colours, and each piece is varnished and polished for a smooth, satin finish.
On the lids there are unique, antique or vintage drawer pulls.

Measures: 11cm in diameter, 10cm high *with slight variations

name: Salt Shaker Cat & Pepper Mill Dog
description:
* Sold together in a handmade box, protected with wood shavings * Contact seller for shipping quote

Made out of a wooden pepper mill and salt shaker, painted in white and blue gray colours with black and white details. All the addings are recycled metallic bits -including nails, washers, tiny screws, nuts, two hair clips for the dog's ears, a section of pipe holding band for their collars -with tiny vintage bell for the cat and a small chain and handle for the dog.

Measures: 14cm high
